verbs.description: [ARG1: A Utah junior high teacher] [V: is] [ARG2: on leave] [ARGM-TMP: after she instructed her students to read the lyrics of an Eminem song that slams President Donald Trump] .

A Utah junior high teacher is on leave after she instructed [ARG0: her students] to [V: read] [ARG1: the lyrics of an Eminem song that slams President Donald Trump] .
